content:
Sure, here's the grouped and nested list of body areas:

* Teeth
	+ Teeth straightening
* Face
	+ Lower face
	+ Cheeks
	+ Under-eyes
	+ Lips
	+ Nasolabial folds or smile lines
	+ Pitted scars
	+ Forehead
	+ Temples
	+ Chin
	+ Marionette lines
	+ Crow's feet
	+ Bunny lines on the nose
	+ Glabellar area
	+ Double chin
	+ Jawline
	+ Mustache, beard, sideburns
	+ Fine lines, shrink the appearance of pores, improve skin tone and texture, and reduce melasma
	+ Upper or lower back
* Neck
	+ Laryngeal prominence of thyroid cartilage
* Body
	+ Abdomen
		- Abdominal wall defects
	+ Hips
	+ Thighs
		- Cellulite
	+ Arms
		- Upper arms
	+ Buttocks
		- Cellulite
	+ Back
		- Upper or lower back
	+ Stomach
		- Gastric
		- Below the buttocks
		- Stomach and small intestine
	+ Love handles
	+ Knees
	+ Elbows
	+ Muffin top
	+ Under the chin
	+ Fat reduction
* Jawline
	+ Upper jawbone
	+ Lower jawbone
* Skin tissue
	+ Lower layers of skin tissue
	+ Soft tissue under the skin
* Facial rejuvenation
	+ Facial reconstruction
	+ Abdominal wall reconstruction
	+ Breast reconstruction
* Navel
* Nostrils
* Upper or lower jawbone
* Gastric
* Nipple-areola complex
* Underarms
* Balding, thinning, or receding areas
* Nasolabial folds or smile lines
* Spider veins
	+ Small, uncomplicated spider veins
	+ Cherry angiomas
	+ Small hemangiomas
	+ Spider nevi
* Varicose veins
* Mustache, beard, sideburns
* D'colletage
* Pitted scars
* Moderate to severe facial wrinkles and folds, such as nasolabial folds, etched-in lip lines, crow's feet, smile lines, marionette lines, under-eye tear troughs, and deep glabellar lines
* Incision or injury
* Broken capillaries, spider veins, vascular lesions, periorbital veins, skin discoloration
* Upper lip, nose, and roof of the mouth
* Clitoral hood
* Vagina and vulva
* Atrophic acne scars
* Fine lines and wrinkles
	+ Forehead lines
	+ Lip lines
	+ Bunny lines on the nose
	+ Neck bands
	+ Above the eyebrows
	+ Above the upper lip
* Skin concerns
* Hormonal acne, polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), high blood pressure, congestive heart failure
* Excess pigmentation and redness, wrinkles and mild acne scars, vascular lesions and varicose veins, pigmented lesions and dark tattoos
* Eye alignment
* Breast augmentation
* Breast reconstruction
* Abdominal wall defects
* Hernia repair
* Depressed scars, acne scars, cellulite dimples
* Vulvar and vaginal tissues
* Craniofacial region
* Stomach and small intestine
* Front of natural teeth
* Enamel, dentin, pulp
* Reshaping, creating balanced, normal breasts
* Lower
